fields.summary: Eucaconsole package for RHEL6 missing python-beaker17 dep

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I tried to install the latest 4.3 console packages on Centos and got the following error: 

{code}
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security
Setting up Install Process
Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile
 * elrepo: repos.lax-noc.com
 * epel: dl.fedoraproject.org
 * extras: mirror.supremebytes.com
euca2ools-release                                                                                                                                             | 1.5 kB     00:00     
eucaconsole                                                                                                                                                   | 1.5 kB     00:00     
eucalyptus-release                                                                                                                                            | 1.5 kB     00:00     
Resolving Dependencies
--> Running transaction check
---> Package eucaconsole.noarch 0:4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6 will be installed
--> Processing Dependency: python-magic for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
--> Processing Dependency: python-gevent for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
--> Processing Dependency: python-beaker17 for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
--> Running transaction check
---> Package eucaconsole.noarch 0:4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6 will be installed
--> Processing Dependency: python-beaker17 for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
---> Package python-gevent.x86_64 0:0.13.8-3.el6 will be installed
---> Package python-magic.x86_64 0:5.04-21.el6 will be installed
--> Finished Dependency Resolution
Error: Package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch (eucaconsole)
           Requires: python-beaker17

{code}

Seeing similar error when installing 4.2.2:
{code}
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security
Setting up Install Process
Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile
 * elrepo: repos.lax-noc.com
 * epel: mirror.chpc.utah.edu
 * extras: mirror.supremebytes.com
euca2ools-release                                                                                                                                             | 1.5 kB     00:00     
eucalyptus-release                                                                                                                                            | 1.5 kB     00:00     
Resolving Dependencies
--> Running transaction check
---> Package eucaconsole.noarch 0:4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6 will be installed
--> Processing Dependency: python-magic for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
--> Processing Dependency: python-gevent for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
--> Processing Dependency: python-beaker17 for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
--> Running transaction check
---> Package eucaconsole.noarch 0:4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6 will be installed
--> Processing Dependency: python-beaker17 for package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch
---> Package python-gevent.x86_64 0:0.13.8-3.el6 will be installed
---> Package python-magic.x86_64 0:5.04-21.el6 will be installed
--> Finished Dependency Resolution
Error: Package: eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8284.676.20160203git791aca7.el6.noarch (eucalyptus-release)
           Requires: python-beaker17
{code}
fields.summary: Latest 4.3 and 4.2.2 eucaconsole packages are missing python-beaker17

comments.body:
This was fixed by my revert of this commit:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole-rpmspec/commit/d40e881e007aa063eabb37955698fd22ff7d9040

I've built using quick launch master and it indeed works properly again.
